channel.title: PyBites - Challenge
channel.description: Python Code Challenges, Articles and News - One Bite a Day

item.title: Code Challenge 33 - Build a Django Tracker, Weather or Review App
item.description: Hi Pythonistas, a new week, a new 'bite' of Python programming. To keep it #100DaysOfDjango, this week we let you get some more practice with this awesome web framework. Last time we had an open Django challenge, for this one we have you choose between 3 specific apps.
item.dc:creator: PyBites

item.title: Code Challenge 32 - Test a Simple Django App With Selenium
item.description: Hi Pythonistas, a new week, a new 'bite' of Python goodness. As anticipated this week we dedicate a challenge to Selenium testing. We think this is a cool skill to add to your web dev + testing repertoire.
item.dc:creator: PyBites
